duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve growth within assigned territory.
Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, contractors, and trade accounts to drive sales.
Analyze territory sales performance and collaborate with sales professionals to develop strategic plans for growth.
Provide excellent customer service and support to enhance efficiency within The Home Depot stores.
Increase customer share, meet sales expectations, and develop relationships with new customers.
Travel to multiple THD stores and manage inventory and merchandising.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate with at least one year of sales or retail experience.
